Services.quote: The most basic definition of prototype is, “A simulation or sample version of a final product, which is used for testing prior to launch.” The goal of a prototype is to test products (and product ideas) before sinking lots of time and money into the final product. We start by imagining the end result. In between, we add an intuitive user experience to increase engagement and conversions.
